name: The fee amount charged to the card account per transaction.
The fee amount charged to the card account when a chargeback occurs.
The fee amount charged to the card account when a return is issued.
The fee amount charged for customer service support.
The fee amount charged for use of an IVR call program.
The fee amount charged for setup of new card account.
The fee amount charged for shipment of plastic.
The fee amount charged for maintaining the card program.
The fee amount charged for sending email/sms messages to card accountholders.
The fee amount charged for usage of an online Bill Pay system.
The fee amount charged for sending/receiving an ACH transaction.
The fee amount charged for doing KYC (Know-Your-Customer) background checks.
The fee amount charge for the Card Account per month.
The fee amount charged per changing of PIN.
The fee amount charged per swipe at POS.
The fee amount charged per swipe at POS, which is declined.
The fee amount charged per ATM at domestic terminals. (based on card currency)
The fee amount charged per ATM at abroad/international terminals. (based on card currency)
The fee amount charged per swipe at POS, which is declined.
The fee amount charged per swipe at POS, which is declined.
The fee amount charged for replacement of a card.
The fee amount charged for closing a Card Account.]
